account_id.title: Account ID
account_id.description: Your Stripe account ID (starts with 'acct_', find yours here).

client_secret.title: Secret Key
client_secret.description: Stripe API key (usually starts with 'sk_live_'; find yours here).

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

lookback_window_days.title: Lookback Window (in days)
lookback_window_days.description: When set, the connector will always reload data from the past N days, where N is the value set here. This is useful if your data is updated after creation. More info here

check_endpoint.title: Check endpoint
check_endpoint.description: Endpoint to hit when checking connection

stream_to_cursor_field.title: Stream to cursor field
stream_to_cursor_field.description: Mapping from stream name to cursor field

stream_to_path.title: Stream to path
stream_to_path.description: Mapping from stream name to path
